パッケージ xyz.mlserver.util

クラス ReflectionHelper

java.lang.Object
xyz.mlserver.util.ReflectionHelper
public final class ReflectionHelper extends Object
Helps you using reflection.

      Find method in class.
      パラメータ:

      methodName - Method name
      args - Class of arguments
      戻り値:

      @Nullable public static <T> @Nullable Method findMethodRecursively(@NotNull("clazz") @NotNull("clazz") Class<? extends T> clazz, @NotNull("methodName") @NotNull("methodName") String methodName, @Nullable @Nullable Class<?>... args)

    • invokeMethod

      public static <T> Object invokeMethod(@NotNull("clazz") @NotNull("clazz") Class<? extends T> clazz, @Nullable T instance, @NotNull("methodName") @NotNull("methodName") String methodName, @NotNull("args") @NotNull("args") Object... args) throws InvocationTargetException, IllegalAccessException, NoSuchMethodException
      Invokes method.
      パラメータ:
      clazz - Class that will invoke method on
      instance - Can be empty if static method
      methodName - Method name
      args - Arguments
      戻り値:
      Result of method
      例外:
      InvocationTargetException - If something went wrong when invoking method
      IllegalAccessException - If invocation isn't allowed
      NoSuchMethodException - If couldn't method find

    • invokeMethodRecursively

      Invokes method.
      パラメータ:
      clazz - Class that will invoke method on
      instance - Can be empty if static method
      methodName - Method name
      args - Arguments
      戻り値:
      Result of method, null if invoked method returned null or thrown error

    • getField

      public static <T> Object getField(@NotNull("clazz") @NotNull("clazz") Class<? extends T> clazz, @Nullable T instance, @NotNull("field") @NotNull("field") String fieldName) throws NoSuchFieldException, IllegalAccessException
      Get value in field in class.
      パラメータ:
      clazz - Class that will get field on
      instance - Can be empty if field is static
      fieldName - Field name
      戻り値:
      Value of field
      例外:
      NoSuchFieldException - If couldn't find field
      IllegalAccessException - If the operation isn't allowed

    • invokeConstructor

      @NotNull public static <T> T invokeConstructor(@NotNull("clazz") @NotNull("clazz") Class<T> clazz, @NotNull("args") @NotNull("args") Object... args) throws IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException, InstantiationException
      Invoke constructor.
      パラメータ:
      clazz - Class that will invoke constructor on
      args - Arguments for invoke constructor
      戻り値:
      Result of constructor
      例外:
      InvocationTargetException - If something went wrong when invoking method
      IllegalAccessException - If invocation isn't allowed
      InstantiationException - If can't be initialized

      Gets all super classes and super interfaces, and return them. The returned entry is not unique and may contains the duplicate entry.
      戻り値:
      the super classes and interfaces.
